backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining job posts, schemes, user profiles, and admin-protected CRUD APIs with access control and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades canister state by preserving existing data and marking access control as initialized.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining public and admin-protected routes wrapped with AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetti: Provides a settings dialog allowing admins to view and save a Gemini API key stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Renders an inline admin login form that checks a hardcoded password and toggles dashboard visibility via DOM updates and localStorage.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Ima: Editor for an image banner block allowing URL, alt text entry, and live preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Lin: Editor for a button-style link block with fields for label text and URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Par: Simple paragraph text editor using a textarea to update block content.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tab: Interactive table editor supporting title input, cell editing, and adding/removing rows and columns.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tit: Editor for title blocks allowing heading level selection and text entry.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteJobP: Shows a confirmation dialog for deleting a job post, with support for loading state during deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostBlo: Enables adding, removing, reordering, and editing structured content blocks for job posts using various block-specific editors.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostFor: Provides a comprehensive form for creating or editing job posts, including images, dates, fees, vacancies, links, and block-based content.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageDail: Allows admins to create and publish a daily quiz question with options, correct answer, and explanation.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Offers a floating image upload tool that stores uploaded images in localStorage and provides copyable links or HTML snippets.
frontend/src/components/AiChatModal.tsx: AI chat modal handling user messages, Gemini API calls, and interactive chat UI with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays access-denied or login-required messaging with optional login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAuthLo: Loading screen shown while verifying admin authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and admin session cleanup.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback card and reset button when rendering fails.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Floating WhatsApp, Telegram, and AI chat buttons with a modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyQuizSe: Displays the daily quiz with selectable options, feedback, and optional explanation.
frontend/src/components/home/Preparation: Section listing preparation resources including books, courses, and test series.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickOffici: Renders a list of official links with highlight support and external link buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/SarkariSche: Displays government schemes with Rajasthan/India tabs, filtering, loading states, and apply-now links.
frontend/src/components/home/SimpleJobsS: Shows a searchable list of quick job updates with categories, last dates, and notification links.
frontend/src/components/home/StudyCorner: Renders study material categories in an accordion with external links to resources.
frontend/src/components/home/VerticalTic: Creates a vertical scrolling ticker with pause-on-hover and reduced-motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Impor: Renders Apply, Notification, and Official Website buttons with availability checks.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobDe: Displays job details such as important dates, fees, age limits, and syllabus link in tables.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobPo: Renders job post content blocks including titles, paragraphs, images, links, and tables.
Shows a job poster image with fallback gradient banner when image is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Usefu: Table of important job-related links like admit card, syllabus, notification, and website with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalBann: Static motivational banner with Hindi text.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Main layout containing header, navigation, search, theme toggling, and global wrappers.
frontend/src/components/SiteNoticeTicker: Displays a scrolling marquee ticker with repeating site notice text and an animated bell icon.
frontend/src/contexts/JobSearchContext.t: Provides context for storing and updating a global job search query.
frontend/src/features/dailyQuiz/dailyQui: Manages daily quiz data in localStorage, including publish, fetch, and clear functions.
frontend/src/features/homeCards/homeCard: Stores home card items in localStorage with default seeding and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/features/officialLinks/offi: Handles official links list in localStorage with CRUD and reordering support.
frontend/src/features/preparationResourc: Maintains preparation resources (books and test series) in localStorage with CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/features/simpleJobs/simpleJ: Stores simple job entries in localStorage with functions to add, list, and delete jobs.
frontend/src/features/studyCorner/studyC: Manages study categories and items in localStorage with CRUD helpers for categories and items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmitCardPosts.ts: Fetches admit card job posts using the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts: Handles client-side admin unlock using a hardcoded password with localStorage and sessionStorage sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyQuiz.ts: Subscribes to and publishes the daily quiz state stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeCards.ts: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD operations for home card items.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and loading logic using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries backend admin status using the actor, considering identity and client-side unlock state.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPost.ts: Fetches a single job post by ID via the backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostMutations.t: Provides mutations to add, update, and delete job posts and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPosts.ts: Fetches job posts filtered by category using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLinks.ts: Manages official links in localStorage with CRUD and reorder operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreparationResourc: Handles preparation resources in localStorage, providing CRUD for books and test series.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchemeMutations.ts: Exposes mutations to add, update, and delete schemes with UI toasts and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchemes.ts: Fetches all schemes from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimpleJobs.ts: Provides a hook to read and modify simple jobs stored in localStorage using an external store.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyCorner.ts: Offers a hook for managing study categories and items with add, update, and delete operations synced to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyllabusRepository: Fetches syllabus repository job posts via react-query using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme preference and syncs it with localStorage and DOM classes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive custom light/dark theme variables plus KBC quiz UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard toggling between login and unlocked views with management tools for links, study items, and schemes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditJobPos: Admin page to create or edit job posts using a form, with save mutations and guarded access.
Admin interface listing job posts with options to create, edit, and delete, including confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdmitCardHallPage.tsx: Displays admit card posts with search filtering, loading states, error handling, and link status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/CheckYourAgePage.tsx: Provides an age calculator UI that computes years, months, and days between two dates.
frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx: Implements an admin login and management panel for jobs, links, cards, resources, and API key storage.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders home sections combining backend and fallback items, with search filtering and multiple feature sections.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Page fetching a job post by ID and rendering hero, content blocks, links, and detail tables with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusRepositoryPag: Displays a searchable list of posts with syllabus downloads, handling loading, errors, and link availability.
frontend/src/utils/linkAvailability.ts: Utility returning availability status and label based on whether a URL exists.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageStore.ts: LocalStorage wrapper providing key-specific subscriptions, cached snapshots, and safe get/set operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues about admin access handling, and feature requests related to fixing admin authorization and UX behavior.
